notes: Stacks multiplicatively with other sources of percentage-based cooldown reductions.
abilities.description: Reduces the cooldown time of all spells and items by 12%.

additionalInformation: The item's attributes grants the following additional bonuses:
8 main attack damage to all / / heroes.
name: Spell Prism
description: Even the slightest flaw in the components of a spell prism can result in the death of its user.
